title: By
contents:
API > @angular/platform-browser
mode_edit code

Bylink

Predicates for use with DebugElement's query functions.

class By { static all(): Predicate<DebugElement> static css(selector: string): Predicate<DebugElement> static directive(type: Type<any>): Predicate<DebugElement> }

Static methodslink

all() link

mode_edit code

Match all elements.
static all(): Predicate<DebugElement>
Parameters

There are no parameters.

Returns

Predicate<DebugElement>

Usage Noteslink

Examplelink
debugElement.query(By.all());

css() link

mode_edit code

Match elements by the given CSS selector.
static css(selector: string): Predicate<DebugElement>
Parameters
selector string
Returns

Predicate<DebugElement>

Usage Noteslink

Examplelink
debugElement.query(By.css('[attribute]'));

directive() link

mode_edit code

Match elements that have the given directive present.
static directive(type: Type<any>): Predicate<DebugElement>
Parameters
type Type
Returns

Predicate<DebugElement>

Usage Noteslink

Examplelink
debugElement.query(By.directive(MyDirective));
